data.app_name: Silent Slayer: Vault of the Vampire
data.description:
Hail to you, Slayer!

The world needs your problem-solving skill and attention to detail to vanquish vampires before a ritual for global domination is complete. 

Will you embark on this mythic quest?

In this immersive tactical stealth vampire slaying game, your mission is to persevere through carefully laid traps and puzzles, and by disarming the vampire coffins’ defenses, your victory will be destroying a clan of powerful sleeping vampires.

Your guide? A mystical book. Your tools? From pry bars and clippers, to a hook made from finger bone and a wooden stake, there is plenty of challenge and reward throughout your conquest.

Driven by curiosity and exploration, the victorious vampire slayers are cautious enough to remove nails and wires to get to the vampire’s heart. Be silent, and be precise, and you will overpower these slumbering beasts.

Focus! You can leave Castle Zar in waste if you:


**Observe the Vicious Vampires** – Swiftly and precisely seal the fate of this royal clan
{3111251929010191}

**Disable the Defenses** – A steady hand will untangle imposing and intricate traps

{1161452688240580}

**Master Your Tools** – Use unique instruments as you encounter increasingly difficult puzzles and situations
{972382391246514}

**Betray the Distractions** – Conquer the diversions that the vampires devised to unsettle the bravest of slayers
{360415666648571}


**Uncover the Story** – Learn the secrets of Castle Zar, the vampires you encounter, and more


Annihilate them, Slayer!

Patch 1.1.2 Bug Fixes and Updates —
- Coffin and tool table will properly adjust to player height on level load.

Patch 1.1.1 Bug Fixes and Updates —
- Addressed performance / hitching issues.

Patch 1.1.0 Bug Fixes and Updates —
- Addressed a game crash related to recalibration. Calibrating player position is more consistent.
- Addressed a game crash related to dropping tools in the coffin. Under-the-hood coffin set-up has been tweaked.
- Save toasts are now headtracked. All toasts and subtitles react to pausing appropriately.
- Players can no longer go under or get objects stuck under the floor.
- Some distractions would collide with the coffin door. They have been adjusted to navigate around the door.
- Watchful Idol tweaks so players have more forgiveness during interactions.
- Tools will settle on the table properly instead of respawning.  
- Tools no longer explode off the table when released.
- Gem sockets are adjusted to reduce physics issues when gems are hooked.
- Items no longer appear during teleportation to/from an encounter.
- Progress related sound effects now adjusted through audio settings.
- New dialogue for Book-Binder in Encounter 10.
